term.title: plastic transition

item.text: A first-order transition that occurs when a low-temperature phase transforms to an orientationally-disordered high-temperature phase with a strong variation of enthalpy.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 577. 'Definitions of terms relating to phase transitions of the solid state (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 588 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030577)
